dodangoda gowijana bala pradeshayata ayath eeriyangala wathurana maha ala pilisakara kirima pinisa aapada kalamanakarana ha manawa himikam amathyanshaya rupiyal laksha dahasayaka mudal prathipadana wen karadi thibe.dodangoda pradeshiya lekam kottasaye 800 di, 800 ech, 800 ee grama sewa wasamwala gowi sanwidhana walin kala illimak paridi me mudal prathipadana laba di thibe.ala pilisakara kirimata adalawa labadi athi mudal prathipadana yatathe me wyapruthiya adiyara thunakin awasan kirimata kaluthara disthrik warimarga departhamenthuwa bhara gena thibe.maha ala pilisakara kirimen pasu pradeshaye wasara gananawak puranwa pawathi kumbauru akkara 300 pamana nawatha waga kala haki bawa pradeshaye gowihu pawasathi.
